20.eng-name: The Book of Qiyam Al-Lail (The Night Prayer) and Voluntary Prayers During the Day

hadiths.text: Abu Nadrah Al-'Awaqi narrated that he heard Abu Sa'eed Al-Khudri say:"The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) was asked about witr and he said: 'Pray witr before dawn (Subh)

chapter.eng-name: The command to pray witr before dawn
